define: Sellers can only cancel compensation disputes, not normal disputes. This means that sellers can only cancel disputes when the return_status is ACCEPTED and the compensation_status is COMPENSATION_REQUESTED.

error_list.name: dispute.cancel.ineligible
error_list.description: Cannot cancel dispute when compensation status is already in COMPENSATION_APPROVED

error_list.name: dispute.cancel.ineligible
error_list.description: Cannot cancel dispute when compensation status is not in COMPENSATION_REQUESTED

error_list.name: dispute.cancel.ineligible
error_list.description: Cannot cancel dispute when compensation status is not in COMPENSATION_REQUESTED

error_list.name: dispute.cancel.ineligible
error_list.description: Cannot cancel dispute when compensation status is already in COMPENSATION_REJECTED

error_list.name: dispute.cancel.ineligible
error_list.description: Cannot cancel dispute when return status is not in ACCEPTED

error_list.name: dispute.cancel.ineligible
error_list.description: Cannot cancel dispute because return SN is not eligible for compensation dispute

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique serial number identifier for a Return Refund request.


Note: Sellers can only cancel compensation disputes, not normal disputes. This means that sellers can only cancel disputes when the return_status is ACCEPTED and the compensation_status is COMPENSATION_REQUESTED.

","name":"return_sn","sample":"2412100F5217W3H","type":"string","required":"True","key":"ESnexFD"},{"description":"

The operator's email address. For operation record keeping purposes (same as v2.returns.dispute API).

","name":"email","sample":"test@example.com","type":"string","required":"True","key":"hRDRPhY"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MAiekF"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"ZcxXa"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"iFJzjeY","children":[{"description":"
